title: Who's the best between between Mecha- PROJECT- Battlecast - Program
body: After Mecha - PROJECT - Battlecast now we got another cybernetic skin line in PROGRAM lissandra and soraka. It's time to decide who's our favorite, VOTE ON THE POLL BELOW!

replies.body:
SUPER GALAXY

http://img08.deviantart.net/e21c/i/2015/046/c/6/lol_wallpaper___super_galaxy_rumble_1920x1080_by_macuapo89-d8i4zrt.jpg

Just who the hell do you think he is?

I'm more inclined to say Battlecast because monster robots trump all other kinds of robots, even though the mecha line is super cool and I'm insta-buying Mecha Zero Sion. PROJECT and Program, while really cool, just don't strike me as much as Battlecast and Mecha. Too...close to human and too clean respectively. Not metal enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-22T23:20:51.667+0000)
>
Not metal enough.
As an older player I'd have to go with Battlecast (Battlecast Cho'Gath was one on my first skins back in 2012), but PROJECT would be a very close second.

Poor DJ Sona - amazing, perfect, but alone in her non-Mecha/PROJECT/Program/Battlecast line.  Failing voting for DJ Sona, I will vote for the effortlessly cool PROJECT, but Program Lissandra's effects are pretty sweet.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-23T02:35:04.623+0000)
>
> Poor DJ Sona - amazing, perfect, but alone in her non-Mecha/PROJECT/Program/Battlecast line.  Failing voting for DJ Sona, I will vote for the effortlessly cool PROJECT, but Program Lissandra's effects are pretty sweet.

Well, i have that and pentakill sona, love it, but cannot put her in her. NEEDS METAL

> [{quoted}](name=Macilento,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-03-23T11:25:59.912+0000)
>
> Well, i have that and pentakill sona, love it, but cannot put her in her. NEEDS METAL

I understand - I have Pentakill, DJ, and Arcade.  Arcade only comes out if I'm duo-ing with an Arcade Miss Fortune, but I regretfully confess to having not used Pentakill very much recently, because DJ brings music for everyone.  Pentakill was my first love though.

Blasphemous!
Pentakill Sona together with Morde are THE original musical skins!

Don't forget about Karthus!
{{champion:30}} : I AM THE LIGHTBRINGER!

Battlecast machines are inelegant, clanking machines with no subtlety or grace.

Programs are rogue AI, corrupted beyond use.

Mecha robots have some elegance in their design, but are ultimate not refined enough.

No, the true robotic overlords are the PROJECT line. Only they combine power with grace in a seamless blending of man and machine.

> [{quoted}](name=Helmight,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-03-23T06:58:48.479+0000)
>
> Battlecast machines are inelegant, clanking machines with no subtlety or grace.
> 
> Programs are rogue AI, corrupted beyond use.
> 
> Mecha robots have some elegance in their design, but are ultimate not refined enough.
> 
> No, the true robotic overlords are the PROJECT line. Only they combine power with grace in a seamless blending of man and machine.

Grace isn't needed for efficiency{{champion:112}}

> [{quoted}](name=Khâmul,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-03-24T15:22:09.021+0000)
>
> Grace isn't needed for efficiency{{champion:112}}

**This is very much true. Function over form, after all.**

[Mecha Skins](http://img03.deviantart.net/6fbb/i/2014/273/b/9/mecha_aatrox_and_mecha_malphite_by_zippo514-d812dw7.jpg)

[Battlecast](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3d/Battlecast_Prime_Cho'Gath_Teaser.jpg)

EDIT: Both lines are amazing. Cant choose between either line.

May I suggest adding the full metal Team to this list. They're overlooked so often it makes me sad for them to be competing with all these new fancy skins with their enhanced particles while we have full metal panth locked up with no new animations or particles trying to not look like a plastic action figure.
I wonder how does Pulsefire Ez fit into this "technopocalypse" future?

> [{quoted}](name=Hildebrand,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jYRi3n89,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-03-23T07:12:20.973+0000)
>
> I wonder how does Pulsefire Ez fit into this "technopocalypse" future?

yeah i guess so, didn't think about that
iBlitzcrank and DJ Sona probably should've been added to the list. Hell, you can see iBlitzcrank in the background of Program Lissandra's splash.
Before, I would have said Battlecast. But that Sion skin.
I honestly like the program thematic and would love to see who else becomes a part of it.

Program is obviously more limited atm since they don't have a Legendary yet, but the two are very well done. I think there is a lot of potential there. Comparing the other Legendaries I'd say Sion takes the cake, but as a whole I prefer the PROJECT line next to Program.

Project. Becasue they still have humanity and they aren't just big robots who can destroy towns. It's pretty cliche for giant robots attackign the world.
Project champs still have chances to be killed by man. 
They seemed more balanced to me.
